alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued June 26 at 7:41PM MST until June 26 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A DUST STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MST FOR MARICOPA COUNTY... At 741 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from Sundad to 7 miles southeast of Sentinel to 9 miles north of Ajo, moving west at 55 mph. HAZARD...Less than one quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 87 and 110. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 10 and 30. Locations impacted include... Sundad and Sentinel. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, then pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake. Motorists should not drive into a dust storm. PULL ASIDE STAY ALIVE!
